name: storyboard
description: End-to-end, hierarchical, real-time, colorful logs and stories
author: Guillermo Grau Panea

scripts.compile: node package && rm -rf ./lib && coffee --no-header -o lib -c src && babel -d lib src && cp src/storyboard.js.flow lib/storyboard.js.flow && cp src/storyboard.js.flow lib/withConsoleListener.js.flow
scripts.build: npm run lint && npm run compile && npm run buildServerLogsApp && npm run buildExtension && npm run test && npm run zipExtension && npm run buildExampleHeroku && npm run xxl
scripts.travis: npm run compile && npm run test
scripts.start: npm run buildExample && npm run example
scripts.zipExtension: rm -f chromeExtension/chromeExtension_*.zip && bestzip chromeExtension_v2.2.0.zip chromeExtension/* && mv chromeExtension_v2.2.0.zip chromeExtension/
scripts.buildExampleHeroku: rm -f example/heroku/client/*.eot example/heroku/client/*.ttf example/heroku/client/*.woff* example/heroku/client/*.svg example/heroku/client/*.js && cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --config src/example/webpackConfig --color --progress --display-chunks -p && cp example/*.eot example/*.ttf example/*.woff* example/*.svg example/*.js example/heroku/client/
scripts.testCovFull: npm run testCovPrepare && npm run testDev && npm run testProd && npm run testBrowser && npm run testCovReport
scripts.testCovFast: npm run testCovPrepare && npm run testDev && npm run testCovReport
scripts.testCovBrowser: npm run testCovPrepare && npm run testBrowser && npm run testCovReport
scripts.testDev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development nyc node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha && mv .nyc_output/* .nyc_tmp/ && rm -rf .nyc_output && cross-env NODE_ENV=development jest --coverage && mv .nyc_output/coverage-final.json .nyc_tmp/coverage-dev.json
scripts.testProd: cross-env NODE_ENV=production nyc node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha && mv .nyc_output/* .nyc_tmp/ && rm -rf .nyc_output && cross-env NODE_ENV=production jest --coverage && mv .nyc_output/coverage-final.json .nyc_tmp/coverage-prod.json
scripts.testBrowser: cross-env NODE_ENV=development TEST_BROWSER=true nyc node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha && mv .nyc_output/* .nyc_tmp/ && rm -rf .nyc_output && cross-env NODE_ENV=development TEST_BROWSER=true jest --coverage && mv .nyc_output/coverage-final.json .nyc_tmp/coverage-browser.json
